feed.title: Keila Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.3
entry.content:
Version 0.14.3

Fixed

  • Only support TLSv1.2 for STARTTLS SMTP Senders to avoid issues with non-compliant TLSv1.3 implementation in OTP

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.4
entry.content:
Version 0.14.4

Fixed

  • Avoid potential partial merging of system sender config with user-configured senders

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.5
entry.content:
Version 0.14.5

Changed

  • Creating and updating contacts via the API now allows setting the status field.
  • Contacts list is now sorted in decending order by default

Fixed

  • Segments are now guaranteed to be initialized with a valid (empty) filter, avoiding potential crashes with nil filters.
  • MAILER_SMTP_FROM_EMAIL is now used for sending system emails again.

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.6
entry.content:
Version 0.14.6

Added

  • Added PATCH and POST API endpoints for updating just the data field of a contact

Fixed

  • Liquid tags are now correctly rendered in layout blocks in the Block Editor (thanks @dompie for reporting)
  • Fixed bug that caused "starts with" and "ends with" to be inverted in segment editor (thanks @dompie for reporting)

entry.title: New release for Keila: Keila v0.14.7
entry.content:
Version 0.14.7

Added

  • Image blocks now allow the use of Liquid in src and other attributes. Fixes #297 (thanks @dompie for reporting)

Fixed

  • Separators are now rendered more faithfully in the block editor
